attributes.action: Make the electricity and gas bills back to the old price !!!
attributes.background: Don't make the bills go up

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The energy cap is set by Ofgem, which is operationally independent of the Government and Parliament.

You might like to sign the following petition, which call for related actions:

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586
